## fromChannel variable

Returns a stream of values received from given [Channel](./csp.channel.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromChannel: <T>(src: Channel<T>, opts?: Partial<FromChannelOpts> | undefined) => Stream<T>
```
